com.wiris.plugin.api

Interface Configuration


  • public interface Configuration
    Precedence order (the last has more precedence)
    1. default-configuration.ini internal default values
    2. ConfigurationUpdater chain from PluginBuiler
    3. configuration.ini
    4. ConfigurationUpdater value of ConfigurationKeys.CONFIGURATION_CLASS

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Properties getFullConfiguration()
      Returns all configuration items.
      java.lang.String getFullConfigurationAsJson()
      Returns all configuration items as a JSon string.
      java.lang.String getJavaScriptConfiguration()
      Returns the JavaScript configuration items as a JavaScript program.
      java.lang.String getJsonConfiguration(java.lang.String configurationKeys)
      Returns the a JSON String containing the configuration values corresponding to a string of configuration keys.
      java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String dflt)
      Returns the value corresponding to a configuration item.
      void setConfigurations(java.lang.String configurationKeys, java.lang.String configurationValues)
      Set multiple properties of the configuration.
      void setInitObject(java.lang.Object context)
      Sets the initialize object with whatever technology specific object.
      void setProperty(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      Set the property of the configuration.
